article: Colors have an effect on our moods. It has been found that colors like red, yellow and orange  _  us while colors like blue, purple and green calm us. Red represents strength, excitement and passion. While  some  amount of red can help to make us feel energetic,  too much  of it can make us feel bored. White represents  _  and peace. As colors have an effect on your moods, you need to choose those colors which would help you  _  the tasks you are doing and you will get to see the difference.
